languages.text: "Нет, архонт, тебе предначертано возмездие. Кровь за кровь. Я не смогу уничтожить весь твой кабал, как ты уничтожила Крударах. Но отрубить змее голову... на это у меня хватит сил".
"No, Archon, you are destined for retribution. Blood for blood. I cannot destroy your entire Kabal as you destroyed Crudarach but I have the strength to cut off the snake's head."
languages.original_text: "Нет, архонт, тебе предначертано возмездие. Кровь за кровь. Я не смогу уничтожить весь твой кабал, как ты уничтожила Крударах. Но отрубить змее голову... на это у меня хватит сил".

traits.locale_text: "No, Archon, you are destined for retribution. Blood for blood. I cannot destroy your entire Kabal like you destroyed Crudarach, but I have the strength to cut off the snake's head."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Non, archonte. C'est la vengeance qui vous attend. Le sang appelle le sang. Je ne peux pas détruire votre Kabale tout entière, comme vous avez détruit Crudarach, mais je peux couper la tête du serpent. »
languages.original_text: "No, Archon, you are destined for retribution. Blood for blood. I cannot destroy your entire Kabal as you destroyed Crudarach but I have the strength to cut off the snake's head."

traits.locale_text: « Non, archonte. C'est la vengeance qui vous attend. Le sang appelle le sang. Je ne peux pas détruire votre Kabale tout entière, comme vous avez détruit Crudarach, mais je peux couper la tête du serpent. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “不，执政官，你注定要接受惩罚。以血还血，以牙还牙。我没办法像你摧毁克鲁达拉赫那样将你的整支阴谋团都消灭干净，但我至少可以斩断蛇头。”
languages.original_text: "No, Archon, you are destined for retribution. Blood for blood. I cannot destroy your entire Kabal as you destroyed Crudarach but I have the strength to cut off the snake's head."

traits.locale_text: “不，执政官，你注定要接受惩罚。以血还血，以牙还牙。我没办法像你摧毁克鲁达拉赫那样将你的整支阴谋团都消灭干净，但我至少可以斩断蛇头。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「違うな、アーコンよ。貴様は報いを受ける運命なのだ。血には血を。我は貴様がクルダラを滅ぼしたように、貴様の陰謀団を滅ぼすことはできないが、蛇の頭を切り落とすくらいの力はあるぞ」
languages.original_text: "No, Archon, you are destined for retribution. Blood for blood. I cannot destroy your entire Kabal as you destroyed Crudarach but I have the strength to cut off the snake's head."

traits.locale_text: 「違うな、アーコンよ。貴様は報いを受ける運命なのだ。血には血を。我は貴様がクルダラを滅ぼしたように、貴様の陰謀団を滅ぼすことはできないが、蛇の頭を切り落とすくらいの力はあるぞ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Nein, Archontin, Euch muss Vergeltung widerfahren. Blut für Blut. Eure ganze Kabale kann ich nicht so zerstören wie Ihr Crudarach zerstört habt, aber ich kann der Schlange den Kopf abschlagen."
languages.original_text: "No, Archon, you are destined for retribution. Blood for blood. I cannot destroy your entire Kabal as you destroyed Crudarach but I have the strength to cut off the snake's head."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Archontin, Euch muss Vergeltung widerfahren. Blut für Blut. Eure ganze Kabale kann ich nicht so zerstören wie Ihr Crudarach zerstört habt, aber ich kann der Schlange den Kopf abschlagen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No, arconte, lo único que te espera es un merecido castigo. Sangre por sangre. No puedo destruir toda tu kábala como tú destruiste Crudarach, pero poseo la fuerza necesaria para descabezar a la serpiente».
languages.original_text: "No, Archon, you are destined for retribution. Blood for blood. I cannot destroy your entire Kabal as you destroyed Crudarach but I have the strength to cut off the snake's head."

traits.locale_text: «No, arconte, lo único que te espera es un merecido castigo. Sangre por sangre. No puedo destruir toda tu kábala como tú destruiste Crudarach, pero poseo la fuerza necesaria para descabezar a la serpiente».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Hayır Arkon, senin kaderinde cezalandırılmak var. Kana kan. Crudarach'ı yok ettiğin gibi tüm Kabalını yok edemem belki ama yılanın başını kesecek güce sahibim."
languages.original_text: "No, Archon, you are destined for retribution. Blood for blood. I cannot destroy your entire Kabal as you destroyed Crudarach but I have the strength to cut off the snake's head."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır Arkon, senin kaderinde cezalandırılmak var. Kana kan. Senin Crudarach'ı yok ettiğin gibi tüm Kabal'ını yok edemem belki ama yılanın başını kesecek güce sahibim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
